scripts.install-projects-win: (npm install) & (cd api-client && npm install) & (cd ../client && npm install) & (cd ../serverless && npm install) & (cd ../storage-dynamodb && npm install)
scripts.install-projects: (npm install) & (cd api-client && npm install) & (cd client && npm install) & (cd serverless && npm install) & (cd storage-dynamodb && npm install)
scripts.dev:dynamodb: cd serverless && serverless dynamodb install && serverless dynamodb start
